en: A Polish environmental NGO complained that the EIB had co-financed the Project “Poland Road Modernisation” although no strategic environmental impact assessment of the Project had been carried out, as required by Polish environmental law.

en: A European decision shall be a non-legislative act, binding inits entirety. A decision which specifies those to whom it isaddressed shall be binding only on them.
